references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPMs), which are a core concept upon which many other models and techniques discussed in the target paper are based.
This paper introduces DreamFusion, a significant method that uses 2D diffusion models to optimize 3D models, which is the main topic of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Dual diffusion implicit bridges for image-to-image translation
references.reason: This paper details Dual Diffusion Implicit Bridges (DDIBs), a crucial component of the theoretical framework used in the target paper to analyze score distillation methods.

references.paper_title: ProlificDreamer: High-fidelity and diverse text-to-3D generation with variational score distillation
references.reason: This paper presents ProlificDreamer, a method directly compared to the approach proposed in the target paper, making it highly relevant to the experimental results and contributions of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper offers a comprehensive analysis of diffusion models, providing important context for understanding the strengths and limitations of methods used and compared in the target paper.
